Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Thomas
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via: Austin, Augusta, Central, Division and Austin, due to, street blockage, near Austin/Thomas.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Austin, Augusta, Central, Division and Austin, due to, street blockage, near Austin/Thomas.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/87th
